description: [MultiLayer Wiper](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1135) uses a batch file, remover.bat to delete malware artifacts and the batch file itself during execution.(Citation: Unit42 Agrius 2023)

external_references.description: Or Chechik, Tom Fakterman, Daniel Frank & Assaf Dahan. (2023, November 6). Agonizing Serpens (Aka Agrius) Targeting the Israeli Higher Education and Tech Sectors. Retrieved May 22, 2024.
